title: What Happened at the Carpenter's Shop
overview: A rumour spread out all over the neighborhood. Yeon-joo, a beautiful, entertaining SNS celebrity, and also a woodworker is being watched and admired by Do-shik.  He decides to ask her for a date one weekend. Do-shik appeared and grasped Yeon-joo without her noticing him.  Meanwhile, the clueless, na√Øve, and honest bookkeeper of the carpenter shop is keeping two huge secrets no one would even thought of.  Finally, the great secret of Yeon-joo and Tae-ju is revealed, turning the tables around.
